title: My Brain
subtle: Informational (nonfiction), 48 words, Level B (Grade K), Lexile BR40L
description: My Brain explains how our brains are needed to do the simplest tasks, from talking to sleeping! Repetitive sentences and high-frequency words support early emergent readers, while the detailed photographs enhance the text. This book can also be used to teach students how to determine the main idea and supporting details in a text as well as to properly use verbs in sentences.
meta: brain, everything, listen, talk, think, use
Ask and answer questions to understand text
Main Idea and Details : Identify main idea and details in a text
Initial Blends : Discriminate initial consonant br-blend
High-Frequency Words : Identify and use the high-frequency word use

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
